prompt:

        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        ```json
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "One-Pan Lemon Spinach Orzo with Feta",
  "description": "Creamy, zesty orzo simmered in vegetable stock with spinach and finished with feta. A quick, mild, one-pan bowl for solo nights.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1) Finely chop red onion.",
    "2) Mince garlic.",
    "3) Zest then juice lemon.",
    "4) Crumble feta.",
    "5) Have vegetable stock measured and ready."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1) Heat olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat.",
    "2) Add red onion and cook 2 minutes until softened.",
    "3) Stir in garlic and orzo; toast 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "4) Pour in vegetable stock, a pinch of salt, and black pepper; stir.",
    "5) Simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, 7–8 minutes until orzo is tender and saucy (add a splash of water if drying).",
    "6) Stir in spinach to wilt, then add lemon zest and 1–2 teaspoons lemon juice.",
    "7) Remove from heat; fold in feta. Taste and adjust salt and black pepper.",
    "8) Rest 1 minute to thicken, then serve warm."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "orzo",
      "quantity": "1/3 cup (about 60 g)",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "vegetable stock",
      "quantity": "1 cup (240 ml)",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "1/4 small",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "2 packed cups",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1/2",
      "preparation": "zest and juice"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "30 g",
      "preparation": "crumbled"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "Pinch, to taste",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "Few grinds, to taste",
      "preparation": ""
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [

    ],

      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
